pr_title: MULE-18454: Cannot serialize artifact declaration using the managed oAuth connection provider

timeline.bodyText: Same comment as in mulesoft/mule-integration-tests#1007 regarding the way the property is set.
timeline.author: ndinu

timeline.bodyText: Avoid code duplication with parent class.
timeline.author: ndinu

timeline.bodyText: The property needs to also be present for the deserialization test.
timeline.author: ndinu

replies.bodyText: Ignore this comment. I was wrong, I meant the load test, but it is not necessary.
replies.author: ndinu

timeline.author: ndinu

timeline.bodyText: If you need a Callable, rename variable and rename the method.
timeline.author: ndinu

timeline.bodyText: I would call the after method in a finally block, and throw and exception if one arises.
timeline.author: ndinu
